Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
model.Transaction
public class Transaction extends Object
Manages all financial calculations for a single checkout transaction. Handles subtotal, VAT, discounts, payments, and receipt generation. This version includes "what if" scenarios: - Multiple payment methods - Returning receipt as a string
Version:
1.7
Author:
BENITO_RAMOS

  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(Customer customer)
      Constructs a Transaction object for a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - (Customer) The customer involved in this transaction.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(CartItem item)
      Adds a CartItem to the transaction.
      Parameters:
      item - (CartItem) The item to add.

    • calculateTotals

      public void calculateTotals(boolean isSeniorOrPWD)
      Calculates the subtotal, discounts, VAT, and final total. For Senior/PWD: Remove VAT first, then apply 20% discount on the entire order.
      Parameters:
      isSeniorOrPWD - (boolean) Whether to apply the senior/PWD discount.

    • redeemPoints

      public double redeemPoints(int pointsToUse)
      Applies membership points to the transaction, recalculating the final total.
      Parameters:
      pointsToUse - (int) The number of points to redeem.
      Returns:
      (double) The new finalTotal.

    • processPayment

      public double processPayment(double amount, String method)
      Processes the final payment.
      Parameters:
      amount - (double) The amount of money received.
      method - (String) The payment method (e.g., "Cash", "Card").
      Returns:
      (double) The change to be given, or -1 if payment is insufficient.

    • setPointsDiscount

      public void setPointsDiscount(double discount)
      Sets the points discount amount.
      Parameters:
      discount - (double) The discount amount from points redemption.

    • setPaymentMethod

      public void setPaymentMethod(String method)
      Sets the payment method.
      Parameters:
      method - (String) The payment method.

    • setAmountPaid

      public void setAmountPaid(double amount)
      Sets the amount paid.
      Parameters:
      amount - (double) The amount paid.

    • setChange

      public void setChange(double change)
      Sets the change amount.
      Parameters:
      change - (double) The change amount.

    • setSeniorPWDCardID

      public void setSeniorPWDCardID(String cardID)
      Sets the Senior/PWD card ID for the transaction.
      Parameters:
      cardID - (String) The Senior/PWD card ID.

    • setPointsRedeemed

      public void setPointsRedeemed(int points)
      Sets the number of points redeemed.
      Parameters:
      points - (int) The number of points redeemed.

    • getAmountForPointsEarning

      public double getAmountForPointsEarning()
      Returns the amount eligible for earning points (Total before points were redeemed).
      Returns:
      (double) The total amount spent.

    • getTotalsString

      public String getTotalsString()
      Returns a string summary of the totals for display.
      Returns:
      (String) A formatted string of the totals.

    • getReceiptString

      public String getReceiptString()
      Generates a full, formatted receipt as a single string.
      Returns:
      (String) The receipt.

    • printReceipt

      public void printReceipt()
      Prints the receipt string to the console.

    • getTransactionSummary

      public String getTransactionSummary()
      Generates a one-line summary for the sales log.
      Returns:
      (String) A CSV-formatted summary string.
